message: Bob, I propose I take $70 and you take $30. This seems fair to me considering the inflation rates we are dealing with.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This accounts for the fact that I face a higher inflation rate.
Bob, I understand your position, but your offer is still not reasonable to me. I'm willing to compromise, so I propose a 65/35 split.  Let's close this deal and avoid further losses from inflation.
